channel.title: Highscores help
channel.description:
Ok so my highscores has had some trouble lately, earlier it was working 100%! with out a problem, but now when someone logs out, it doesn't delete there file, and re save it. my problem :
[9/22/12 8:27 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViola tionException: Duplicate entry 'teste' for key 'PRIMARY' [9/22/12 8:27 PM]: at item.title: Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

"INSERT INTO `hiscores` VALUES ('" + c.playerName + "', '" + c.playerRights + "', '" + c.isDonator + "', '" + overallLVL + "', '" + overallXP + "', '" + c.playerXP[0] + "', '" + c.playerXP[1] + "', '" + c.playerXP[2] + "', '" + c.playerXP[3] + "', '" + c.playerXP[4] + "', '" + c.playerXP[5] + "', '" + c.playerXP[6] + "', '" + c.playerXP[7] + "', '" + c.playerXP[8] + "', '" + c.playerXP[9] + "', '" + c.playerXP[10] + "', '" + c.playerXP[11] + "', '" + c.playerXP[12] + "', '" + c.playerXP[13] + "', '" + c.playerXP[14] + "', '" + c.playerXP[15] + "', '" + c.playerXP[16] + "', '" + c.playerXP[17] + "', '" + c.playerXP[18] + "', '" + c.playerXP[19] + "', '" + c.playerXP[20] + "', '" + c.playerXP[21] + "', '" + c.playerXP[22] + "', '" + c.playerXP[23] + "', '" + c.playerXP[24] + "')");

You have a part to insert, but not a part to delete?
Find this line…

And add this before it…

Should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Please post a picture of how your database is structured, tables, and columns. Any one of the tables will work. And also, this problem refers to there already being a PRIMARY key, usually being ID. So there may be information with ID 1 and it’s trying to put it there, without it being deleted.

Read full topic
